description: Marcus Mojo has just gotten a new 'toy'. The cutting edge of robotics technology, the Roboho has finally been shipped and is ready for him to use. He's got it all set up in the basement and he's ready to take it for a spin. He grabs the remote and presses 'Dance' and before you know it, the NikkiBot is pole dancing just like a real live stripper. After that, Marcus' cock is rock hard and so he's ready to see what else this thing can do... well, let's just say that this thing is full featured with all the bells, whistles and holes.Enjoy!
title: Roboho
